key.name: host
key.description: This is the saved pyLoad server address to connect to once the client loads up.

key.name: port
key.description: This is the saved pyLoad server port to connect to once the client loads up.

key.name: autoconnect
key.description: Whether or not to connect to the saved pyLoad server when the app loads up.

key.name: username
key.description: The username will be used to pull the password from the keyring and log in to the pyload server.

key.name: window-size
key.description: The last size of the window to be used again on next startup.

key.name: maximised
key.description: The last maximised state of the window to be used again on next startup.

key.name: column-order
key.summary: The order of the queue columns
key.description: This is an array of the column names to be added sequentially into the queue tree header.

key.name: column-sort
key.description: The column name to be sorted.

key.name: column-sort-order
key.summary: The sort order of the sorted column
key.description: The sort order, either ASC or DESC, to sort the column by.

key.name: column-order-size
key.summary: The size of the order column

key.name: column-name-size
key.summary: The size of the name column

key.name: column-links-size
key.summary: The size of the links completed column

key.name: column-size-size
key.summary: The size of the size column

key.name: column-downloaded-size
key.summary: The size of the downloaded column

key.name: column-speed-size
key.summary: The size of the speed column

key.name: column-progress-size
key.summary: The size of the progress column

key.name: column-eta-size
key.summary: The size of the ETA column
